Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition -- 10.81 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a ten and eighty-one hundredths (10.81) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $1,351,250 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of providing funds for equipment, supplies, maintenance, operation, construction, improvement, renovation and support of the Allen Parish Library and its branches?
